name: Meowventure
author: DeveloperCats
short: A fun adventure game for Discord
description: Meowventure is a text-based adventure game where players can explore, battle, and collect cats!
install_msg: Thanks for installing Meowventure! Use `[p]meowventure` to start your adventure.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
